description:
### 11.146 libvmaf_cuda

This is the CUDA variant of the libvmaf filter. It only accepts CUDA frames.

It requires Netflix’s vmaf library (libvmaf) as a pre-requisite. After
installing the library it can be enabled using: `./configure --enable-nonfree
--enable-ffnvcodec --enable-libvmaf`.
name: libvmaf_cuda

options.description: Set the file path to be used to write log.
options.name: log_path

options.description: Set the format of the log (csv, json, xml, or sub).
options.name: log_fmt

options.description: Set the pool method to be used for computing vmaf.
options.name: pool

options.description: Set number of threads to be used when computing vmaf.
options.name: n_threads

options.description: Set interval for frame subsampling used when computing vmaf.
options.name: n_subsample

options.description: Set the model to be used for computing vmaf.
options.name: model

options.description: Set the feature to be used for computing vmaf.
options.name: feature
